title: Here are the 5 best Apple deals currently available in the yearly Memorial Day sales
author: alex-whitelock
summary: It's not just appliances on sale this Memorial Day....
article: The yearly Memorial Day sales tend to be more associated with cheap appliances than Apple deals, but, if you're a fan of premium tech you'd honestly be surprised at how many excellent options there are this weekend.

Indeed, we're actually seeing some of the lowest prices yet on a number of the latest MacBooks, iPads, and even Apple Watches. We're always on the lookout for Apple deals here at TechRadar so we've rounded up what we think, in our humble opinion, are the five best ones to check out this weekend.

MacBooks in particular are down to the cheapest prices yet on the latest M1 models - just $899 for the MacBook Air and $1,099 for the MacBook Pro respectively at Amazon. And, while we've just missed the first-ever price cut on the 2021 Apple iPad Pro 11 (also at Amazon), you can still score yourself the 2021 iPad Air for $549 - just $10 more expensive than its lowest ever price.

Just below you'll find our top Apple deals for this weekend's Memorial Day sales. If you're curious about what else is available, then at the bottom of the page we've rounded up the best deals from across the web. You can also visit our main Memorial Day sales page for an in-depth look, or even our main Apple Memorial Day sales hub page.
